content: the pattern is workedcuff-down with heel flap written for the magic loop method with circular needle as this is a free pattern there is an instruction for one size only but it would be cute to adjust the number of stitches to a smaller size referring to the size of peppercorn socks 1 if you find any errors in this pattern or have any questions please send an e-mail to kao amumu@gmail com **sizes** 1 finished foot circumference 18 5cm / 7 25 ※socks should be knit a little smaller than your actual foot size for a better fit 1 foot length substruct about 2-3 cm for the adult size from the actual size 2 foot circumference substruct about 3-4 cm for the adult size from the actual size ex if your actual foot size is 23 cm in length and 23 cm in circumference your socks size should be 20-21 cm in length and 19-20 cm in circumference **needles** us 1 / 2 25 mm circular needle 32 / 80 cm adjust needle size if necessary to obtain the correct gauge optional us-b / 2 5 mm crochet hook for m3hb m3hb can be worked either with knitting needles or crochet hook both methods are explained in the tutorial videos on amumu youtube channel 2 **notions** 3 stitch markers tapestry needle optional cable needle for daisy crown daisy crown can be worked either with knitting needles or cable needle both methods are explained in the tutorial videos on amumu youtube channel 3 **gauge** 32 sts × 44 rnds in stockinette s = 10 cm / 4 after blocking **yarn** fingering weight yarn **sample** mc lemon jelly pool daily sock 425 m / 465 yds-100 g 75% superwash merino 25% nylon 0 35 skein 150 m / 162 yds-35g col pavane cc life in the long grass sock fine 400 m / 438 yds-100 g 75% superwash merino 25% nylon 0 05 skein 20 m / 22 yds-5g col oyster 可愛いと思います。もしパターンにエラーを見つけたり わからない部分があったら kao amumu@gmail com までご連絡ください **サイズ** 1 足囲 出来上がり寸法 18 5 cm ※靴下は 実際のサイズよりも少し小さめに編んだ方が フィットします 1 足の長さ 実際のサイズから 2-3 cm ほど引いた長さ 2 足囲 実際のサイズから3-4 cm ほど引いた長さ ex 実際のサイズが足長 23 cm 足囲 23 cm の場合 靴下の出来上がり寸法は足長 20-21cm 足囲 19-20 cm **針** us 1 / 2 25 mm 輪針 コードの長さは 80 cm 推奨 またはゲージにあった針 オプション usb-1 / 2 5 mm かぎ針 m3hb 用 棒針のみで編むこともできますが かぎ針を使って編むこともできます どちらの方法も amumuのvideo
